xwikidoc.content:
Import repositories from GitHub into this wiki. {{velocity}} #if (!$hasAdmin) {{error}}You need Administration rights to import Repositories!{{/error}} #end {{html}}
Github Organization from which to import Repositories
GitHub authentication token in the format: "[user name]:[token]". If not specified, anonymous access will be used and is limited by GitHub to 60 requests per hour.
Whether to re-import data from GitHub for already existing Repositories found in this wiki
{{/html}} #if ($request.action == 'Import') #if ("$!request.organization" != '') #set ($overwrite = ($!request.overwrite == 'overwrite')) #if ("$!request.authentication" != "") #set ($authTokens = $stringtool.split($request.authentication, ':')) #set ($result = $services.githubstats.importRepositoriesFromGitHub($authTokens[0], $authTokens[1], $request.organization, $overwrite)) #else #set ($result = $services.githubstats.importRepositoriesFromGitHub($request.organization, $overwrite)) #end ## List results #if (!$result) {{error}}An error occurred.{{/error}} #elseif (!$result.isEmpty()) {{info}} The following repositories were imported: #foreach ($repo in $result) * [[$repo]] #end {{/info}} #else {{info}}No new repositories were imported.{{/info}} #end #else {{error}}You need to specify a GitHub organization!{{/error}} #end #elseif ($request.action == 'Delete all Repositories') #set ($repos = $services.query.xwql('from doc.object(GitHubStats.RepositoryClass) as repos').execute()) {{info}} The following repository pages will be deleted: #foreach ($repo in $repos) * $repo #end Type 'ok' to confirm deletion of these repositories {{html}}
#elseif ($request.action == 'Really delete all Repositories' && $!request.confirmDelete == 'ok') #set ($result = $services.githubstats.deleteRepositories()) #if (!$result) {{error}}An error occurred.{{/error}} #elseif (!$result.isEmpty()) {{info}} The following repositories were deleted: #foreach ($repo in $result) * $repo #end {{/info}} #else {{info}}No repository was deleted.{{/info}} #end #end {{/velocity}} = Imported Repositories = {{include reference="GitHubStats.ListRepositories"/}}
